filmography.title: Higher and Higher
filmography.role_description: A fictionalized version of himself; this musical comedy marked his first major acting role after gaining fame as a singer.
filmography.plot: A bankrupt playboy's servants scheme to pass off a scullery maid as a debutante to marry a wealthy man and save the household.

filmography.title: Step Lively
filmography.role_description: A young playwright with a golden voice who gets caught up in a theatrical production's financial woes.
filmography.plot: A producer tries to get his show produced before the check he wrote bounces, involving a young playwright with a great singing voice.

filmography.title: Anchors Aweigh
filmography.role_description: A shy sailor on shore leave who relies on his smoother friend (Gene Kelly) to help him get a date.
filmography.plot: Two sailors on a four-day shore leave in Hollywood meet a young singer and try to help her get an audition.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Musical Score; Oscar: Nomination – Best Picture

filmography.title: Till the Clouds Roll By
filmography.role_description: Appears as himself in a grand finale segment, singing 'Ol' Man River' in a white suit.
filmography.plot: A musical biography of the life and career of composer Jerome Kern, featuring an all-star cast.

filmography.title: It Happened in Brooklyn
filmography.role_description: An ex-GI returning to Brooklyn who struggles to make it as a singer while living with his friends.
filmography.plot: A talented singer returns from the war to his Brooklyn neighborhood, trying to break into show business with the help of friends.

filmography.title: Take Me Out to the Ball Game
filmography.role_description: A baseball player who moonlights as a vaudevillian, caught in a romantic entanglement with the team's new female owner.
filmography.plot: Two baseball players who moonlight as vaudevillians run into trouble when their team is taken over by a woman.

filmography.title: On the Town
filmography.role_description: A practical sailor on 24-hour shore leave in New York who gets aggressively pursued by a female taxi driver.
filmography.plot: Three sailors on a day of shore leave in New York City look for romance and adventure.

filmography.title: From Here to Eternity
filmography.role_description: A scrawny, spirited soldier who suffers tragic abuse in the stockade; the dramatic role that revitalized Sinatra's career.
filmography.plot: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing in his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actor; Golden Globe: Win – Best Supporting Actor

filmography.title: Suddenly
filmography.role_description: A psychopathic assassin who takes a family hostage in their home while waiting to snipe the President of the United States.
filmography.plot: A group of assassins take over a house in a small town where the President is scheduled to pass by on a train.

filmography.title: Young at Heart
filmography.role_description: A cynical, down-on-his-luck musician who disrupts the life of a wholesome family.
filmography.plot: A musical remake of 'Four Daughters' about a family of sisters whose lives are changed by the arrival of a charming composer and a cynical arranger.

filmography.title: Not as a Stranger
filmography.role_description: A loyal and dedicated friend to an ambitious medical student, providing moral support and grounding.
filmography.plot: A medical student marries an older woman to pay his tuition, but his arrogance alienates those around him.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Guys and Dolls
filmography.role_description: A charismatic gambler struggling to find a location for the oldest established permanent floating crap game in New York.
filmography.plot: A gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Motion Picture (Musical/Comedy)

filmography.title: The Tender Trap
filmography.role_description: A swinging theatrical agent enjoying the bachelor life in New York until he meets a woman determined to marry him.
filmography.plot: A theatrical agent with a bevy of girlfriends finds his bachelor lifestyle threatened when he falls for a woman with a plan for marriage.

filmography.title: The Man with the Golden Arm
filmography.role_description: A talented drummer and recovering heroin addict who struggles to stay clean while dealing with a manipulative wife and high-stakes card games.
filmography.plot: A junkie must face his true self to kick his drug addiction.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actor; BAFTA: Nomination – Best Foreign Actor

filmography.title: High Society
filmography.role_description: A reporter for a tabloid magazine covering a high-society wedding who falls for the bride.
filmography.plot: A spoiled heiress, planning to marry a stuffy man, is surprised by the arrival of her ex-husband and a tabloid reporter.

filmography.title: The Joker Is Wild
filmography.role_description: A dramatic portrayal of the real-life singer whose vocal cords were slashed by the mob, forcing him to reinvent himself as a comedian.
filmography.plot: The story of Joe E. Lewis, a singer who refused to kowtow to the mob, survived a brutal attack, and returned to show business as a comedian.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Original Song ('All the Way')

filmography.title: Pal Joey
filmography.role_description: A charming, womanizing singer who manipulates a wealthy widow to fund his own nightclub.
filmography.plot: A charming singer romances a wealthy widow to fund his own nightclub, but complicates things by falling for a chorus girl.

filmography.title: Some Came Running
filmography.role_description: A disillusioned army veteran and writer who returns to his small hometown, torn between a respectable teacher and a 'loose' woman.
filmography.plot: A veteran returns home to the small town he left years before and finds himself torn between two women.

filmography.title: A Hole in the Head
filmography.role_description: An irresponsible widower and hotel owner in Miami who tries to raise his son while chasing get-rich-quick schemes.
filmography.plot: A widower father runs a small Miami hotel and tries to keep his business afloat and raise his son.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Original Song ('High Hopes')

filmography.title: Ocean's 11
filmography.role_description: The cool leader of a group of WWII veterans who team up to rob five Las Vegas casinos on New Year's Eve.
filmography.plot: Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist.

filmography.title: Can-Can
filmography.role_description: A lawyer in 1890s Paris who defends a nightclub owner accused of presenting the scandalous Can-Can dance.
filmography.plot: A Parisian nightclub owner is sued for performing the Can-Can, but her lawyer has a trick up his sleeve.

filmography.title: The Manchurian Candidate
filmography.role_description: A Korean War veteran plagued by nightmares who uncovers a communist brainwashing conspiracy involving his former platoon.
filmography.plot: An American POW in the Korean War is brainwashed as an assassin for a Communist conspiracy. Another POW must put together the pieces of the puzzle to save him.

filmography.title: Robin and the 7 Hoods
filmography.role_description: A Chicago gangster who inadvertently becomes a philanthropic hero while battling a rival mob boss.
filmography.plot: A Chicago gangster tries to maintain his territory against a rival while becoming a philanthropic hero to the public.

filmography.title: Von Ryan's Express
filmography.role_description: An American POW who leads a daring train escape across Italy into Switzerland during World War II.
filmography.plot: An American POW leads a group of Allied prisoners on a dangerous escape by hijacking a German train.

filmography.title: Tony Rome
filmography.role_description: A tough, wisecracking private investigator living on a houseboat in Miami who gets mixed up in a complex case.
filmography.plot: A private detective is hired by a millionaire to find his daughter's lost diamond pin, leading to a web of crime and murder.

filmography.title: The Detective
filmography.role_description: A hard-boiled New York police detective who investigates a murder and uncovers deep-seated corruption within the force.
filmography.plot: A detective investigates the murder of a gay man and uncovers a web of corruption involving city officials.

filmography.title: The First Deadly Sin
filmography.role_description: An aging police sergeant nearing retirement who tracks a serial killer while caring for his dying wife.
filmography.plot: An aging police officer pursues a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City, while dealing with his wife's terminal illness.
